tsType.name: union

subPageId.description: The id of the sub-page the option navigates to.

selected.description: Whether the option is selected or not. (Setting this property assumes controlled behaviour)

value.description: The value of the option. Should be set for options in selectable groups.

href.description: Providing href will render the option as `<a>`. Doesn't work, if subPageId is provided or is in a selectable group.

as.description: Element type to render as. Will be set to `<a>` if href is provided. If the parent is "ul" or "ol", the option is forced to be "li" element. *Important*: `Drilldown` is rendered as `ul` by default so you *have to* change that as well if you want to use this prop.

role.description: The ARIA role of the element

elements.name: signature
elements.raw:
{
  as: DrilldownOptionOwnProps['as']
  role: DrilldownOptionOwnProps['role']
  variant: DrilldownOptionVariant
  vAlign?: RenderContentVAlign
  isSelected: boolean
}

renderLabelInfo.description:
Info content to render after the label.

If a function is provided, it has a `props` parameter.

renderBeforeLabel.description:
Content to render before the label.

If a function is provided, it has a `props` parameter.

renderAfterLabel.description:
Content to render after the label.

If a function is provided, it has a `props` parameter.

beforeLabelContentVAlign.description: Sets the vAlign of renderBeforeLabel content

afterLabelContentVAlign.description: Sets the vAlign of renderAfterLabel content and renderLabelInfo

descriptionRole.description: The ARIA role of the description element

tsType.name: signature

type.name: signature

value.name: signature

onOptionClick.description: Callback fired when the option is clicked.

defaultSelected.description: Whether the option is selected by default.

elementRef.description: Provides a reference to the underlying html root element

shouldCloseOnClick.description: Should close the container menu component, if clicked on the option marked with this prop
